# gal-checkbox



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property        | Attribute       | Description                               | Type      | Default     |
| --------------- | --------------- | ----------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `checked`       | `checked`       | Whether the checkbox is checked           | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `disabled`      | `disabled`      | Disable interactions                      | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `indeterminate` | `indeterminate` | Indeterminate visual state (minus)        | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `label`         | `label`         | Optional label text (fallback if no slot) | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `name`          | `name`          | Native input name                         | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `value`         | `value`         | Native input value                        | `string`  | `undefined` |

| ------------------ | ----------- | ------------------------- |
| `galBlur`          |             | `CustomEvent<FocusEvent>` |
